Equip: Your healing spells have a high chance to cause you to inject yourself with a charge of Volatile Serum. Multiple charges may overlap.

If an ally drops below 70% health, expel a charge to heal them for 409,957. If unconsumed after 15 sec, charges catalyze to grant you 4,831 Intellect for 10 sec instead.
